title: Cultivating Sustainable Design Leaders: Reflection and Practice Through Self-Narration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in design or science fields
context.additional_context: For Learners in Manager/Leader Roles, Conducted in Smartphone-Based Limited Technology Environments. Non-degree Program with Summative Assessment-Centered Evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can submit two self-reflective narratives within one week, incorporating symbiotic relationships between human and non-human elements.
Learners can explain three or more relational awareness frameworks necessary for sustainable design practices.
Learners can complete a personal/organizational sustainability action plan through self-reflection activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
